EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to your team's graduation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am writing to let you know that the graduation day for the young people you worked with in The Challenge during the summer will be on {!Job_placement__c.00NC0000005Eq5m}.
Their graduation will be held at {!Job_placement__c.00NC0000005Eq5r}. It will start at {!Job_placement__c.00NC0000005Eq5X} and will finish at {!Job_placement__c.00NC0000005Eq5h}. You would be very welcome to attend.
If you are able to come, please let us know.
Many thanks for all your work with us over the summer.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.OwnerEmail}
